name: Toy Story
description: Led by Woody, Andy's toys live happily in his room, but when Buzz Lightyear arrives, the duo eventually learns to put aside their differences.

name: Jumanji
description: When siblings Judy and Peter discover an enchanted board game, they unwittingly release a host of dangers including hunter Van Pelt.

name: Grumpier Old Men
description: The antics continue as the old rivals face new romantic entanglements in this heartwarming sequel.

name: Waiting to Exhale
description: Four African-American women share their personal struggles and support each other through love and heartbreak.

name: Father of the Bride Part II
description: George Banks faces the double trouble of his daughter expecting a child and his wife expecting another.

name: Heat
description: A master thief and a dedicated detective square off in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse in Los Angeles.

name: Sabrina
description: A chauffeur's daughter returns from Paris transformed and captures the attention of the wealthy Larrabee brothers.

name: Tom and Huck
description: Based on Mark Twain's classic tale, Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn witness a crime and race to save an innocent man.

name: Sudden Death
description: A disgraced firefighter must thwart a terrorist plot during game six of the Stanley Cup finals.

name: GoldenEye
description: James Bond faces off against a former agent threatening global security with a powerful satellite weapon.

name: The American President
description: A widowed President finds romance with an environmental lobbyist, but political obstacles arise.

name: Dracula: Dead and Loving It
description: Mel Brooks parodies the classic vampire tale with hilarious results.

name: Balto
description: Inspired by true events, a half-wolf, half-dog leads a mission to deliver medicine through the Alaskan wilderness.

name: Nixon
description: An in-depth look at the life and career of President Richard Nixon.

name: Cutthroat Island
description: A pirate captain and her crew search for hidden treasure on the infamous Cutthroat Island.

name: Casino
description: The rise and fall of a casino manager entangled with mobsters and corruption in Las Vegas.

name: Sense and Sensibility
description: Two sisters navigate love and societal expectations in 19th-century England.

name: Gone with the Wind
description: An epic tale of love and loss set against the backdrop of the American Civil War.

name: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
description: Four teenagers are sucked into a video game and must survive its dangers to return home.

name: Spider-Man
description: A high school student gains spider-like abilities and must protect New York City from the Green Goblin.

name: Titanic
description: A tragic love story unfolds aboard the doomed RMS Titanic.
